review: I already own a Roku 3 for the living room, and I decided I wanted one in the bedroom. Since where the TV is a small space I wanted something simple, without cables, that stayed hidden. This did the trick. It plugs into the HDMI port (and USB for power) and you're off. Just create a account (or sign in) and you're up and running. Very simple to use. I love the Roku experience in such a tiny device.
author: Marc B
